{{cpp/container/mdspan/extents/title|rank}}
{{cpp/container/mdspan/extents/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++23|
static constexpr rank_type rank() const noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Returns the number of dimensions in {{rlpt|/|extents}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
The number of dimensions.

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;mdspan&gt;

int main()
{
    std::extents&lt;int, 1, 2&gt; e1;
    std::extents&lt;int, 3, 4, std::dynamic_extent&gt; e2(5);
    std::cout &lt;&lt; e1.rank() &lt;&lt; ", " &lt;&lt; e2.rank() &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=
2, 3
}}
